call_title: Bene | Bruno Woltzenlogel Paleo & Jossemii | ErgoHack 9

key_facts.fact: Contribution tokens are called contribution accounting tokens or proof of funding tokens
key_facts.speaker: Bruno

key_facts.fact: Stable Order needed 5000 ERG to develop an SDK for Gluon Gold
key_facts.speaker: Bruno

key_facts.fact: Example vault parameters: 2000 EAT tokens, rate of one EAT per ERG, minimum 500 ERG, deadline two weeks
key_facts.speaker: Bruno

key_facts.fact: Example scam scenario: dev team asking for five million ERG with two week deadline
key_facts.speaker: Bruno

key_facts.fact: In the example scenario, 3 million ERG was raised after one week before funding stopped
key_facts.speaker: Bruno
